| Scale Type | Description                                                             | Feature Type                          | Further classification | Example                                    |
|------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------|------------------------|--------------------------------------------|
| Nominal    | no meaningful order                                                     | qualitative                           | discrete               | gender; eye colour                         |
| Ordinal    | Expressions can be ordered, but distances cannot be interpreted         | qualitative + low quantitatve aspects | disctrete              | always > frequently > occasionally > never |
| Cardinal   | Expressions are numbers whose distances can be interpreted meaningfully | quantitative                          | discrete/continous     | height; duration                           |
